tool_description: Technical Analysis tools for crypto markets.
name: miru
title: miru

api_list.name: getCoinInfo
api_list.description: Get given coin name/symbol, current price, marketcap, whitepaper, circulating supply, circulating supply percentage, etc.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://miru.p.rapidapi.com/info/coin/bitcoin"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "miru.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://miru.p.rapidapi.com/info/coin/{coin}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "miru.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getSMA
api_list.description: Get simple moving average price value.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://miru.p.rapidapi.com/sma/BTCUSDT/4h/60"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "miru.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://miru.p.rapidapi.com/sma/{pair}/{interval}/{periods}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "miru.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getDefaultIchimokuSignal

api_list.name: getIchimokuSignal
api_list.description: Get Ichimoku signal according to provided configuration parameters.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://miru.p.rapidapi.com/ichimoku/signal/BTCUSDT/4h/20/60/120"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "miru.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://miru.p.rapidapi.com/ichimoku/signal/{pair}/{interval}/{tenkan}/{kijun}/{spanbfuture}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "miru.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
